website_summaries.verdict: A great, hefty hose nozzle that makes you feel like a fireman.
pros: This nozzle has a large handle for ease of use as well as an adjustable spray head that functions like a classic hose nozzle, offering a range from light spray to heavy stream
The ergonomic grip facilitates extended use
cons: Some users are disappointed that this model only features one spray pattern

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've had it a couple months. It is easy to use. It doesn't leak. My Achilles tendon hurt so I can leave it on by my chair and just push it on and off without going up and down the stairs when it's wet. Power is great and the nozzle adjusts to short of far distance. It's feels good holding it, like if you drop it it's not going to break. I bought one. Now I have three. The other 2 are for the back.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Super Spray & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought my first one of these, I won't bother with any other. All of our hoses have this nozzle. When one hose needed replacing, we couldn't get the nozzle off so we tossed it all, thus the need for another nozzle. I didn't have to think about which one to buy. I've had others in the distant past - I knew this was the one I wanted. Super heavy spray, strong spray, with a force tip or you can spread it for a wide spray. It great.
customer_reviews.author: chuckrclose

customer_reviews.title: If There's a Better Nozzle, I don't Know About It!
customer_reviews.text: The best hose nozzle that I've ever used. Power, ease of use and reliability. We live in Arizona, where the sun is relentless. The sunshine here will beat anything up over time. Anything! These will last us several years without fail. I always buy a couple of replacements, before we need them, as they are getting difficult to find. We've tried other nozzles and they malfunction, spray gets distorted, they get hot in the sun. NONE of that with Gilmour's Firemans Nozzle. The BEST by far!
customer_reviews.author: Denny L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide a small diameter high pressure stream of water for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: If you want a garden hose for flowers or grass, this would be fine. If you want to clean something like cracks between pavers or small openings, this doesn't do the job. Though it shows a very small diameter hole for the water to exit, in fact it has no possibility of providing a steady high pressure jet of water for spot cleaning. It is far too big an opening and there is no diminishing channel to force the water into a thin but strong stream. It's okay for big jobs but not worth having for fine jet high pressure cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: JMF12345

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price with great water pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago when they branded by Nelson. The on/off handle would leak and spray water everywhere when not fully open or closed. It's the main reason why I replaced it. As others stated the rubber gets brittle and cracks with age exposing the metal underneath. It produces the best pressure making it easier to water everything and enough pressure to clean.
customer_reviews.author: InquisitiveGuy

customer_reviews.title: Bees knees.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! You pretty much get whatever stream you want. It’s perfect for gardening, it makes a really soft SHOWER when you set it right. It won’t beat your plants up. For my hanging baskets I barely pull the lever to let it run slow and again, it doesn’t beat my plants up. When I wash the truck I can make it run a really strong stream. Buy it, it’s a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: New Man toy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one, my son in law saw it. I ordered him one so I could use mine. He gets his and 3 neighbors (grown men) are in his front yard playing with it Plus my grandson has 7-8 kids over playing fireman! He thinks it will be at least a week before he has to turn the sprinklers back on again! Bonus? Works great, well built, priced right and it perfect for many jobs around the house. Great range and types of sprays through the two adjustments (volume and pattern).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but started leaking within a month.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just a month ago and when I used it this evening the water came out as expected but it also sprayed out on both sides where the handle is attached. I did check to see if I could tighten up the screws but they did not budge. I have another one of the same style that I purchased the month before and so far no issues with that one. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Chapel,FL

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my most favorite sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Gilmour garden hoses and always recommend them to friends and family. Since I love their hoses so much, I thought I'd try the sprayer. I highly recommend this sprayer. My home sits on a acre of land and I'm just getting ready to buy another sprayer because I'm tired of taking the one sprayer and having and move it from hose to hose. Gilmour has the best quality items, don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bogus. Useless. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item in December 2017. Did not get around to using it until July 2018. This nozzle is the most useless item I have EVER purchased in my life. No kidding. Does not spray any further or harder than a standard nozzle. When you try to shape the water jet, the nozle simply stops working. TOTAL COMPLETE RIP-OFF.
customer_reviews.author: bdsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great, STURDY nozzle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nozzle that should provide years of service. It is constructed well, and easy to operate. It's great for watering the yard, or washing the car. Large control surfaced for older operators. You don't have to hole down a handle to maintain flow. Twist the front to select spray pattern, and pull back or push forward on the large bail, and easily adjust water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, trouble free sprayer worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased this sprayer at a big box store years ago and loved it. Tried finding them again but were not in store. Happy to find it online. This is one of the sturdiest, leak proof, trouble free sprayer nozzles I’ve ever had. We leave ours outside all the time and although it weathers it doesn’t fail to provide great functionality for years.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect this to be a pressure washer, it's not any different than a normal hose nozzle. With the exception that it's 100 times easier to turn on and off by moving the lever, no hand cramping squeezing required, and good weight. Had one several years ago and after it finally broke couldn't find another one at the local big box store. Was happy to find it again on Amazon. The spray adjusts from a jet-like stream to an ever widening circle until it's just water bubbling out as if it were just the hose--helpful when watering flower pots and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I love it when I order something on Amazon and it's on my doorstep 4 hours later. When I opened the package, I was surprised (happily) at how big this nozzle is. It's sturdy, hefty and solid. I like that it can shoot a very solid hard stream of water and then go from there to washing the car and then to the garden to water the plants. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Uruviel Ancalímon

customer_reviews.title: This is not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great nozzle... However the hose connection, to the nozzle, leaks like a sieve!!! I tried adding a second rubber seal cut the leak down a little... I then wrapped the hose connector in Teflon pipe thread tape and tried it again, this didn't stop the leaking either! Make sure you are wearing your bathing suit when you use this nozzle!! You're gonna need it. This nozzle is not worth the time money or effort... don't buy it!!! I guess you get what you pay for!! Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Steve J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for three years that I am slowly wearing out. It may wear out in the next 10 years lol but I can't find them locally anymore so when I found it on Amazon, I bough it for the future because they are perfect for watering the garden and so heavy duty I can't tell you how much I love ours!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieMBot

customer_reviews.title: Not for home use
customer_reviews.text: This unit is more suited for commercial environments with high pressure. Residential pressure does not allow the unit to function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, still not durable
customer_reviews.text: I find myself buying new hose nozzles often, most are cheaply made and fail relatively quickly. This one is heavy duty and the price reflects a quality hose nozzle. Unfortunately after one month of light use around the yard mine broke unexpectedly, do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: avid amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Very good nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I have very good water pressure in our garden and this is the absolute best nozzle I have every used, out of the very many I have used. However, water pressure is key. On other faucets where I don't have very high pressure it works ... just ok. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rand

customer_reviews.title: Great nozzle but parts of it are starting to harden and crack.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the issue is but the red nozzle part may not as durable as my previous version since the red rubber (?) around the nozzle and the handle is cracking and getting brittle/hard. Great nozzle however, I just may have received one that had production issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great Flow but Leals a Little
customer_reviews.text: This nozzle is larger than I expected but I am good with that. I use this nozzle mainly for washing our cars. The water flow is great and has excellent control of spray pattern. I do have a leak from the metal ring at the base of the nozzle (not from the washer where it screws to the hose. I like everything about this nozzle except the leak.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the seams horribly.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks horrible from first use. I had the previous 'other brand' equivalent that doesnt leak. This squirts from the seam in all directions. Horrible. Keep in mind, this is not where it screws on, but at a seam.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you have enough pressure and volume to run it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one in 10 years. They work very well as long as you have enough pressure and volume to run them. I run mine off of a three-quarter inch line from the main water supply coming into the house and it works wonderfully for either washing the car or watering the yard or bathing the dog or filling the pool. It provides enough pressure at needlepoint or enough volume at fine spray.
customer_reviews.author: Grant D.

customer_reviews.title: not what i expecited
customer_reviews.text: It is not powerful it is just like a regular hose nozzle I needed something stronger
customer_reviews.author: phlx1212

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: terrible will not spray properly. should of got the real deal for just a bit more money danshafarms
customer_reviews.author: Danshafarms

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product is great. I already have a SMALL fireman's hose nozzle ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality of product is great. I already have a SMALL fireman's hose nozzle and love it. Subsequently, I searched for more - ordered two, received them promptly and they are great quality, but are LARGE, which I did not realize they were going to be a different size. The small nozzle works well for my hand size (woman), whereas the two I just received are large and are more difficult to use as a result. Still good products - more useful for a man.
customer_reviews.author: plainandpnut

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This nozzle might be a bit heavy for some people but it is a perfect example of high quality engineering and manufacturing. It truly does a wonderful job of letting all available water flow through, in whatever pattern you desire. In the more "open" settings, my hose remains limp... meaning a lot of gallons per minute BUT far less time for me standing outside watering the lawn. Closed off, the pressure builds up but WOW... the distance that this nozzle can throw water is crazy! Perhaps more than double the distance of my old, generic nozzle. This is a perfect gift idea for any guy that you aren't sure what to get for him. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pog

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF PRESSURE
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor has two of these on his hoses and they blast out water and you can also control the setting and flow of the water. I wanted some of my yard and they are super wonderful. Great price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Checkley

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Nozzle Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST water nozzle I have ever had. I have been using these for over five years and purchased these for my new neighbor. She was looking for a strong, durable hose nozzle and I highly recommended this particular one to her. It is made of metal, not plastic, so lasts so very much longer. You can adjust the pressure, distance and type of spray with this nozzle with only the turn of the Red end and the handle turns off and on.
customer_reviews.author: DALE

customer_reviews.title: The Finest Hose Nozzle You Will Ever Find
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I liked my first one that I purchased a second for the back yard. The handle easily regulates the spray and also operates like a handle when the hose is pulled to another direction. The best for washing a car.
customer_reviews.author: William Tell

customer_reviews.title: A great spray nozzle at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for last summer and this one. I really like this spray nozzle. It could be better in that the pattern could be more consistent and the plastic could resist sun bleaching better, but for the price this nozzle is exceptionally well made. Pros: smart valve design (forward is off) Nicely made valve Softer plastic/rubber around the nozzle control helps prevent damage when dropped from short distances Cons: The pattern control could be more consistent in the spray (the cone is often misshapen) Plastic/Rubber could resist sun bleaching better The pattern control could be stiffer which would prevent the pattern from changing when you set it down and pick it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, adjusts from a gentle shower to a jet stream. Keep in mind it flows quite a bit more water than your average garden nozzle, so if you don't have decent flow/pressure, you won't get a lot of distance from the jet stream. I like the built in valve, it lets you turn the water flow off and on without altering the setting of the nozzle. The handle for the valve doesn't feel as substantial as I've seen on other, pro quality (more expensive) nozzles with built in valves, but it hasn't failed yet in almost 2 years of use. I do take care not to bang it around much, which I'm sure helps.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bruha

customer_reviews.title: One of the best hose nozzles I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best hose nozzles I've ever owned. My only minor complaint is that is will not produce a fine mist. I guess that's to be expected from this large, high-pressure nozzle. I love the fact that I can set the spray pattern (with the round red front end of the nozzle) and leave it where I want it and then reduce or shut off the water flow with the handle. No need to twist and twist through the entire range of spray patterns to shut off the water flow. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: A construction worker suggested this product and I ordered two; one for the front yard and one for the back. Works really well and the pressure is adjustable. I am very glad I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity and quality of this item is great..I purchased two and there have not been any issues with leaks or any other problems and they have been used regularly all summer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a hose nozzle that will stay on without my having to squeeze it and will have a powerful enough jet to power wash my deck. The control on this is great for my purpose; you move the lever to where you want it and it stays there, which is great. However I wasn't able to get it to concentrate the stream of water enough to wash my deck at all, much less "power" wash it. This nozzle is also relatively heavy, which is a negative for me. It'd probably work OK for rinsing your driveway or washing your car, but if you need a really powerful, concentrated jet of water, this doesn't do it.
customer_reviews.author: kheitl

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I love this nozzle, Sam’s club used to sell them that’s where I got my original but this one is exactly the same. I love the variety of mode to choose from for whatever job your doing.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Superb for people with failing hand strength
customer_reviews.text: Size and function are perfect for my carpal tunnel. Easy to use even during flair ups. Cuts watering time and use in half. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used out of pkg
customer_reviews.text: Well I return mine because it broke and requested a replacement and they sent me a used or returned one. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: DIANE ORTIZ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For durability and sturdiness be advised I have only had the product for a few months. But so far no problems I like the product and will buy again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: John Stults

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product recommend and do not put the hose on tight or it will leak faulty o-ring maybe use a Teflon o-ring or something otherwise works great no leaks if you don't put it too tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome power yet gentle for flowers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, these are awesome. They have such a strong spray cleaned off the side of our garage it looks great gentle enough for your flowers. Kudos to whoever made this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first one lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: My first one lasted a long time but sun exposure will damage the plastic over time
customer_reviews.author: Toobz

customer_reviews.title: Best sprayer out there!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! Great sprayer shoots so far, and works like a fire hose! Definitely changed all of the hose sprayers around the house to these and bought 1 as a back up if one breaks
customer_reviews.author: C Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase of this quality item.  Arthritics pay attention!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. I cannot tell you how great this nozzle is. So easy to use and wow the coverage. Arthritic hands need this and you will not be disappointed! The first one I purchased 6 years ago and is now in the front of the house. New one in the backyard. Never leaks and just a turn of the front and tons of different patterns. The lever reduces and increases the flow so quickly. Everyone that sees this work asks me where did I find this. I send them all to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Oreo Cookie

customer_reviews.title: THESE SIMPLY ARE THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: IT'S NICE TO WRITE A PRODUCT REVIEW THAT'S TOTALLY POSITIVE....I HAVE THREE HOSES AROUND MY HOUSE AND I USE THIS ON ALL OF THEM. OVER THE LAST 9 YEARS I'VE BOUGHT 7 OF THEM. THEY USUALLY LAST 2-3 YEARS WITH MY USE, EVENTUALLY THE ADJUSTMENT PART LOCKS UP AND THAT'S THE END. THEY ARE WORTH BUYING.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Ordered additional nozzles for protecting property near home from potential fire.
customer_reviews.text: Great spray options with good water pressure. I have 160 Lbs at the outdoor faucets. Can wash the roof.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Throws a lot of water a long way
customer_reviews.text: I live in a wildfire area in Southern California and bought several of these nozzles in case a fire hits here. The nozzles throw a lot of water a long distance, which is the goal. My water pressure is about 80 pounds and these must have a range of 30 to 40 feet or more. The nozzle is very easy to control. I have a solar electric system and I use the nozzle to rinse it off. The nozzle is very easy to control in that application and the ability to have a fine, dispersed spray, and then a forceful, concentrated spray is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff SwitzerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best and most versatile hose nozzle I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hose nozzle and built very well. I had one just like it for about 15 years and finally tossed it because it had gotten cracked by dropping it on a concrete driveway so many time. I don't understand some of these reviews. This is the same high quality product they have always made.
customer_reviews.author: Publius

customer_reviews.title: Retired Firefighter enjoys thinking he can still play with his nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I find these at Sams seasonally and they are as good a novelty as they are functional. Rubber on handle gives way sooner than later, but the seals are good and who doesn't grin when they see what looks like a fire nozzle on an ordinary garden hose. Why not?
customer_reviews.author: Vicki and Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fireman's nozzle for high pressure situations
customer_reviews.text: If you have enough water pressure this works fairly well. The shut off feature is good allowing going back to the same nozzle spray type after shutting off the flow and then reopening it. Without 45+ PSI there isn't enough pressure to make this even as good as the swivel nozzles with a trigger. When I put it on the end of a water pump, it had great distance, volume of water sprayed, and variety of patterns going through over 50 gallons in a minute. Since what i needed was for fire suppression, this is ok for what I need it to be ready to do.
customer_reviews.author: Picky in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Huge and heavy--
customer_reviews.text: Well, this puppy truly could work for a fireman. I was looking for a nozzle with on and off adjusting as well as adjustable spray. It is HUGE and heavy. For the right application, it would probably be great, but for normal garden sprinkling and spraying, I go for something lighter. I've tried many different nozzles and really like the Dramm one with only two settings, stream and spray and a thumb controlled on and off. Unfortunately, I have very high water pressure and they aren't quite heavy enough to last over time.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: The best nozzle out there
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement nozzle for an identical one that I have used for several years. I want a nozzle that delivers a very strong spray of water and one that I can adjust the spray pattern and the strength of the flow from light and easy for flowers to fast and strong for cleanup jobs or where I need the maximum amount of water delivered in short order. Works splendid for car washing, too, rinses the car clean following the wash, and washes away the brake dust from the wheels. I would definitely buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: John in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Great garden hose pressure
customer_reviews.text: Just received this garden hose sprayer, and am very pleased. Was looking for one that had good pressure for cleaning the concrete in a dog pen. This is it. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Nicoletti

customer_reviews.title: I love this nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I love this nozzle! My Sam's Club stopped selling it, but Amazon came through for me! I have several of these nozzles (the oldest being 5 years old) - they work great (even after being dropped and dragged on concrete on a daily basis). I love how easy it is to adjust both the flow rate and spray pattern, and that you can take the spray pattern from a skinny "blast" to a wide shower.
customer_reviews.author: r0ck3t

customer_reviews.title: One bad mamajama!
customer_reviews.text: Just tilled and reseeded our lawn. Needed something that could really get the water down in heavy volume. This unit will do it. It can really get the water out there, much further than a traditional sprayer, and it can do it with mass volume. What some of the other reviews are using it for, is not clear, but if you want a nozzle that gets volumes of water down quick and can spray much further than a regular sprayer, this unit is it. Cut my watering times down significantly. Ordering another one for the back yard. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ribs & Blues

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED..
customer_reviews.text: Leaks from seam as mentioned in other reviews, also the metal piece that screws into the front of the nozzle unscrews by itself and i eventually lost it while watering... didn't even last 3 days of use... VERY DISAPPOINTED... waste of time and money...
customer_reviews.author: matt rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I have a hose nozzle that actually feels durable! I purchased a second one. They do require a reasonable amount of water pressure and volume at the faucet to work well. The spray is infinitely adjustable, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: Good for Much More Than a Fire
customer_reviews.text: We really like this nozzle. It's good for so many things. It's the best hedge/flower/garden watering nozzle we've ever had (and we've had them all). We have different nozzels for different applications (lots of plants - from trees to hedges to potted plants). After trying this one it will always be in our tool chest of hoseware. It's quickly become the one we use the most! For those that want more pressure, use a shorter and/or smaller diameter hose. We have 2 of these. One on a 100' hose and one on a 25' foot hose, both 5/8". The pressure on the 25' hose is MUCH higher than on the 100'.
customer_reviews.author: Rorcutt

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one on our fire aparatus (firetrucks)
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest, i bought this unit mainly because of the novelty: it looks a lot like the nozzles at our volunteer fire company, and i thought it would be a lot of fun to have around the house! In the end, i didn't get to use it, i was looking for some gifts for a firefighter friend of mine and i figured he would also enjoy it...turns out he did, he loved it...so i guess have to pick up another one for myself! I don't have kids yet, but down the road, i think it would be a great gift for children who want to play "firefighter" in the back yard :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty nozzle that is easy to use and can take high pressure well. We have several and give them heavy use. Frequent issue is the screw holding the valve handle has come out of two different ones. We replaced with a similar screw and had no problems. If you put the original screw back in it will eventually back out again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: These were the least expensive handle actuated nozzles I could find. Others that screw in and out require you to adjust the spray each time you use it. The handle allows you to leave the spray adjustment where needed. I have several of these for emergency fire suppression on my land with 130’ no kink hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: WOW...WOW...WOW
customer_reviews.text: Just received this nozzle and...WOW! I have tried just about every nozzle on the plant over the years. Some great, but only last for a while. Some have been good to OK for a longer time. Some barely acceptable. Some are beautifully designed, but poorly constructed. And then there's all the junky ones. PROS: This nozzle sends a tight stream of water farther then anything I've ever had (50 ft. easy), I get the full force of my water pressure (no restrictions), the pressure is easily controlled with the large handle, the stream shape stays put until I change it. CONS: It's a little heavy, but I'll acclimate to it. My last test is for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Bucephilus

customer_reviews.title: Full pressure
customer_reviews.text: Very well made no issues yet, bought one from local retail store and the water pressure was cut done by more than half. This connection you get full water pressure was no blocks. Will buy another for the other end of house
customer_reviews.author: molerat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the product received
customer_reviews.text: The product works but the whole mechanism is misaligned causing it to not spray very well. I’m disappointed because I’ve had this type unit before and it worked great for years. It just wore out
customer_reviews.author: Ynotbd

customer_reviews.title: Not as amazing as hoped
customer_reviews.text: As an avid gardener, I am constantly watering during our short growing season in Michigan. I love the huge on/off lever in this. I find the variety of spray patterns and volume of water disappointing -- and I have amazing water pressure. It is sturdy and reliable; perhaps $3 over priced but compared to much of the similar junk on the market, pretty good. I really wish there was a company who took irrigation products seriously and built and priced them accordingly. It seems that most of what's on the market is good for one season and questionable much beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Ed H

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace something similar that we bought at Home Depot a few years ago. I LOVED the design and wanted something similar to our old one, which only broke because the plastic on the on/off lever where it attaches to the body broke. The downside of this design is that it doesn't have a pistol-type grip like our previous one had. It kinks the hose a little when you hold it parallel to the ground. Not a big deal and doesn't seriously impede flow, but a small annoyance and the only reason that this has gotten 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Very versatile! I use it for watering the garden to putting out campfires. I bought it for washing my car. I like to regulate the water wash my car, and this nozzle provides me with that ability. I can control the power of the stream to the shape of the cone. Best yet it is all metal. The handle is rubber coated aluminum; the housing is aluminum, and the nozzle head is rubber coated aluminum. I have been using it for about a year now, and I highly recommend it. I have had many and used many nozzles, and this is clearly the best....so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rator03

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Four Years
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted four years before the Arizona sun got to it. The lever where it attaches with the screws is very thin and has cracked; otherwise this nozzle would probably last several more years. I see no easy way to fix it, so better just get a new one. I love the operation, but am not thrilled with the price so will look for a cheaper one of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryAuthor

customer_reviews.title: It works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have no dislikes just enjoy the easy usage, and the various spray directions. I love how I can go from vertical circle to a long distance stream, and the coating is smooth and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ronald dasner

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is heavier than my old nozzles and I don't think it sprays any further... and you need 2 hands just to hold and move the lever with this one. The really good thing about this nozzle is that it is very sturdy and less prone to breakage when dropped. So if you're tough on a nozzle, this is the one for you. I'll continue to get the ones that I can set on "shower" or "jet" and use the hand holding it to also move the on/off, increase/decrease lever with my thumb.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: It does not work with a regular hose pressure.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this and had great goals of washing cars. It does not work!!! The pressure is nothing like the commercials. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this nozzle....
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this nozzle, bought two, one for myself and one for my guy...he really loves it too. I really like being able to stand it up on the handle and watering my flower beds. We have excellent water pressure here, so it is really easy to use when watering a large area. I have several varieties of nozzles, but nothing compares to this fireman's nozzle...it is also very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: BUFFY REED

customer_reviews.title: Like this nozzle so much I will continue to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Like this nozzle so much I will continue to purchase for all my outside faucets. Water flows in large enough volume to get the job done and over with but you have the ability to slow down the flow when the job calls for it
customer_reviews.author: Lucille B.

customer_reviews.title: More hype that anything else
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle is rather big and bulky. Awkward to hold especially if watering the lawn or washing the car. You get no more water pressure from your 1/2" or 5/8" garden hose with a regular other type nozzel since it is probably piped in from a 1/2" water line. There is a pistol type fireman's style that is probably more practical and easier to hold and turn on and off. In short, I wish I did not buy it...more of an ulgy novality item that I hope breaks soon so that I can replace it with an old fashion pistol type grip nozzel.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Probably the coolest thing in its catagory
customer_reviews.text: The round thing at the bottom is a lever you pull up or down to control the flow. It works pretty much like a fireman's hose. I'd know, my Dad was a fire fighter for many years. It really boosts the flow of water and it is easy to control. It has a good weight to it and is clearly a quality product. If you need a power nozzlle, this is the one. For what it is and what it does, it is reasonably priced. It really has two ways to control the spray. The on/off lever I mention and a twist cap on top. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: I want to LOVE this Product
customer_reviews.text: Because my water pressure is NOT that great, this product under performs. It looks so cool, and the ON/OFF handle is so nice... but the lack of high water pressure makes this a joke. Well, to be honest, the family did not laugh at the nozzle, they laughed at ME for the lack of performance. No man wants to be made fun of in that area. Instead, go with the little brass nozzle (Amazon.com) and you WILL be the envy of everyone. Best of all, now my Grandson feels like a real fireman when he uses that one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Be careful where you leave this, and have a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine unless you leave it outside in direct sun. The internal plastic components break-down with heat, then fractures, and cannot be repaired. They cheaped-out by not using any metal for the 'working' (internal) parts. I bought mine for actual fire-fighting (emergency use) and I'm now entering into the fire-season here in the parched west. I'm so glad that I found out mine no-longer functioned BEFORE I literally needed it to save my house. Now the 'trick' is to find a nozzle that I rely on when truly needed.
customer_reviews.author: lonewolfmtn

customer_reviews.title: This is my third one
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these and they are great. Good pressure and tough construction.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I like the different adjustments also
customer_reviews.text: I water a large area of landscape. To include flower beds using a hose. This high pressure attachment reaches places I dont use an extension hose now. I like the different adjustments also. It is very good and it works as advertised. I also enjoy being able to turn it off and on at the large handle at the end of the hose attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: best nozzle ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is just the best nozzle I have ever owned. Can't recommend it too highly. Troyboat.
customer_reviews.author: Troyboat

customer_reviews.title: Could be the best garden hose nozzle ever
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few years now and it is pretty beat up, but still the best, highest flowing nozzle I've ever used. Sprays significantly more water than even well built metal normal nozzles at farm stores. If you have the pressure, this will really shine and save you time. I do recommend using high quality hose, as my wife bought some smaller flat/folding hose, and it worked pitifully compared to my good stuff. Plus, isn't it always fun spraying much farther than your neighbors?
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, and then some
customer_reviews.text: Sick of the poorly built and half plastic alternatives that never last more than a month or 2. This is the 4th one of these I have because i want one on every hose. Great pressure and good for every chore from watering plants to washing the car. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Collins

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent yard tool. Easy to adjust force and spray to water small plants or large bushes. Great for car washing, too. The push-pull operation of the handle, from full on to off, beats the heck out of the twist-style nozzles. Likewise, the handle stays in place to keep water pressure constant, and beats the heck out of the trigger type nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Willy4

customer_reviews.title: One of the best water sprayer under $20
customer_reviews.text: I hand spray my large back and front yards every day as an exercise. After one month's use I felt this is one of the best water sprayer under $20. I even bought another one right away just in case the price goes up.
customer_reviews.author: Ted C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for garden use.
customer_reviews.text: I try to use one nozzle for everything but this is certainly not for washing the car. Every time you set it down the nozzle moves so that means every time I pick it back up I have to readjust it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hose.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent volume and distance if you have the pressure and flow in your supply. it's the best I have ever seen, an easy 50 feet. Cleans dirt bikes better in 1/2 the time. Still OK @ 30 psi. Don't run it over - plastic internal parts will break. Worth the money. Larger than expected, it's cool. Used 6 months, then run over and destroyed. I have ordered another. Loss of star for structural weakness - it did not lift a car or truck it's 3" diameter and survive. It took 2-3 drive overs to kill it (not me!?)
customer_reviews.author: Roy Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful high quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and allows plenty of water to flow through. The controls are easy to use. I purchased one and have bought two more for my other hoses. I was looking for a good nozzle for a 3/4 garden hose attached to a 1" water line at 30-60 PSI. This nozze can do much more pressure but even at this lower pressure it has a long range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed And Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: Leaks at hose fitting, even with plumber's thread tape. Made In China.
customer_reviews.author: Shreddr

customer_reviews.title: Stand up to the high pressure
customer_reviews.text: This is always a good choice and works well for a few years and then time to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Oh.My.Gosh!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very little experience buying nozzles and bought this one because Amazon noted that those who'd purchased the hose I'd selected had also bought this so that's what I did. My husband almost fell on the floor laughing when he saw it, after it arrived because it's clearly a "Fireman's Style Industrial Spray Nozzle". BUT it makes watering the flowers so much fun and when it gets hot this summer I fully expect to use it to cool down. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Diaz Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I needed to spray lots of water on a freshly graded road to harden the ground. With this nozzle, I was able to wet down everywhere without walking from corner to corner: this nozzle can shoot out a good volume of water pretty far. It's easy to adjust the water volume with the handle and spray-width by turning the nozzle head. It's been left outside under the intense sunshine for months but no problem. It's a good product. Just ordered another for my front yard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: We have a good amount of water pressure at the house so I feel like a firefighter with this. Just adjust the spray by turning the end and voila! I always leave the water on, and it doesn’t leak. It’s a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Lasts Many Seasons
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few garden hose spray nozzles, and each one only lasted one season. This spray nozzle has lasted a few seasons now. It is easy to operate - the on/off mechanism is easy to use with the large lever, and spray adjustment is easy by rotating the red end. I think this nozzle has lasted a while because the controls are easy without small complicated dials that get gummed up after one season use. I would recommend this nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Turner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nozzle! We received one about 5 years ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nozzle! We received one about 5 years ago as a gift. It still works perfectly. Saw this on Amazon and bought a second one for another hose. Has adjustments for hard pressure and just turn the tip of it to power down for a fine spray. We would recommend this to family and friends! It truly is the very best nozzle we have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Kozesky

customer_reviews.title: You will love this
customer_reviews.text: Usually when you have a hose squirter it just goes ten feet or so but this thing puts that water out about 30 feet and it is really fun to see and play with. You can really power wash your driveway with this fireman's nozzle. Just don't squirt anybody with this set on the strongest setting because it would hurt. Unless your wife is 30 feet away then you can squirt her. No pain unless she catches you :)....
customer_reviews.author: Randy S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not get any better than this nozzle. About the best available. Allows almost the full volume of water flow. I had bought two of these. However when I try to buy another one the price almost doubles. I guess I will not be buying this again from Amazon. $25.00 on Ebay and Walmart
customer_reviews.author: rockcutter

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your water pressure
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me how awesome hers was so I purchased one. It's sorta heavy and hard to hold. Also if you have low water pressure like I do this nozzle doesn't do much to improve the water flow. I use it out back on the garden because I can control the flow for watering plants better with it and because I didn't want to go to all the trouble of returning it. It does have a nice fun look and you can control the flow with just a turn of the head.
customer_reviews.author: neasie62

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, works just average.
customer_reviews.text: This nozzle looks great but only works just like an average nozzle. Very easy to operate--would work great for someone with arthritis or other hand issues.
customer_reviews.author: AnneH

customer_reviews.title: The best spray head I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Running a landscape company and nursery, we are constantly watering something. Regular spray nozzles will end up hurting your hands after a while, and don't really have that great of a flow. This head really does what it is advertised to do. It allows the most water through of any nozzle I have used. The only problem I see, is that if I don't order more soon, my employees will steal this one, Thank you Gina
customer_reviews.author: GinaBrown

product_meta.title: Gilmour 855032-1001 High-Pressure PRO Fireman's Spray Nozzle with Large, Red/Black
product_meta.description:
Size:FiremansDesigned for the pros, this watering tool delivers the durability of die-cast zinc construction and comfortable, ergonomic handle for superior comfort and control.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The LR Nelson High-Pressure Rated Fireman's Style Industrial Spray Nozzle comes with a large on/off lever for quick shut off. The adjustable spray nozzle allows for 300% more water-flow compared to regular pressure nozzles.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty, die-cast zinc construction for to withstand rough use
250 PSI to weather high water pressure
Large on/off lever with added spray control
Adjustable spray head alters spray from powerful jet to light rinse
Grip Guard insulation for comfort during extended use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,492 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
